## Problem 1
### Create subdirectory
```{r}
library(tidyverse)


dir.create("./hw2data")

```

```{r}
transit_data = read.csv("./hw2data/NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_And_Exit_Data.csv")
transit_data = janitor::clean_names(transit_data) # clean name of data

transit_data

newtransit_data = select(transit_data, # filter columns 
  line:route11, entry, entrance_type, vending, ada) %>%
  mutate(entry = ifelse(entry == "YES", TRUE, FALSE))  # convert character into logical
  

newtransit_data


```
